name: 0-1672 frosty town potholders
notes:
**knitted pot-holders with nordic pattern and houses in drops cotton light. theme: christmas.**
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

#frostytownpotholders
drops design: pattern cl-155
yarn group b

-------------------------------------------------------


**size**:
1 pot-holder: 17 x 17 cm.

**yarn**:
drops cotton light from garnstudio (belongs to yarn group b)
100 g colour 50, dark ivy
50 g colour 01, off white

1 pot-holder weighs approx. 50 g.

**needles**:
drops circular needle size 3 mm: length 40 cm.

**knitting tension**:
23 stitches in width and 32 rows in height with stocking stitch on needle size 3 mm = 10 x 10 cm.
note: remember, the needle size is only a guide. if you get too many stitches on 10 cm, change to a larger needle size. if you get to few stitches on 10 cm, change to a smaller needle size.
